snippet: Fresh off of its record-breaking performance in the women’s eight at the 2012 Samsung World Rowing Cup II, the U.S. women’s team now has 10 days to finalize its Olympic lineups.
abstract: Fresh off of its record-breaking performance in the women’s eight at the 2012 Samsung World Rowing Cup II, the U.S. women’s team now has 10 days to finalize its Olympic lineups.

headline.main: Video: Women's Eight Rowing Team Preparing to Defend Gold
